Text: considering the trouble this movie has caused, and the fact that it's total crap anyway, it should be banned on piratebay, and so should this idiot "educational" for reuploading it.
Phasar: No ban at all. Users are able to upload whatever they want. THAT is the purpose of TPB. You have been here for long and you still didn't understand that?

@Hero. Well said. Some people seem to have missed the point.
Thanks educational.

Free speech is absolutely worth defending!

Especially against the tyranny that want to control our minds! Be it from clergy or politicans!

It is time for the human mind to reach the next stage of enlightment!

Hero: You are my hero!
